tasks.label: Run main pipeline with strict model
Extract class names from oracle_options_pipeline.py
tasks.command: cd /Users/omar/Documents/Projects/oracle-x && python -c "import ast; content=open('oracle_options_pipeline.py').read(); tree=ast.parse(content); classes=[node.name for node in ast.walk(tree) if isinstance(node, ast.ClassDef)]; print('Classes found:', classes[:10])"
